80 years. Chava (Carlos Padilla) is a boy of 11 years after his father abandoning the family in the midst of civil war in El Salvador, becomes the "man of the house". Because of the war the military government recruit boys under 12 years, removing them from classrooms. Chava still has a year to also be recruited, and in this period needs to get a job to help his mother (Leonor Varela) to pay the bills and also escape from the daily violence caused by civil war. .
